## Public Member Functions

### optimizeStrNCmp() {#ac9d71bcb73b24374e675d3ac3b8f5e8b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool StrNCmpInliner::optimizeStrNCmp ()">
First we normalize calls to strncmp/strcmp to the form of compare(s1, s2, N), which means comparing first N bytes of s1 and s2 (without considering &#39;\\0&#39;).

Examples:


<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">strncmp(s, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;a&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, 3) -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a0651aa0a52c69c4fe12cf730e7ed65ab">compare</a>(s, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;a&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, 2)</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">strncmp(s, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;abc&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, 3) -&gt; compare(s, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;abc&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, 3)</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">strncmp(s, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;a\\0b&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, 3) -&gt; compare(s, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;a\\0b&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, 2)</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">strcmp(s, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;a&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) -&gt; compare(s, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;a&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, 2)</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> s2&#91;&#93; = &#123;</span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;a&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">strncmp(s, s2, 3) -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a0651aa0a52c69c4fe12cf730e7ed65ab">compare</a>(s, s2, 3)</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">char s2&#91;&#93; = &#123;</span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;a&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;b&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;c&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;d&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">strncmp(s, s2, 3) -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a0651aa0a52c69c4fe12cf730e7ed65ab">compare</a>(s, s2, 3)</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>


We only handle cases where N and exactly one of s1 and s2 are constant. Cases that s1 and s2 are both constant are already handled by the instcombine pass.

We do not handle cases where N &gt; StrNCmpInlineThreshold.

We also do not handles cases where N &lt; 2, which are already handled by the instcombine pass.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/aggressiveinstcombine/aggressiveinstcombine-cpp/#l00925">925</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/aggressiveinstcombine/aggressiveinstcombine-cpp">AggressiveInstCombine.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### inlineCompare() {#aa45bb97a2545ac411b158bdbedf2ebef}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void StrNCmpInliner::inlineCompare (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; LHS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> RHS, uint64&#95;t N, bool Swapped)</>}>
Convert.

<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">ret = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a0651aa0a52c69c4fe12cf730e7ed65ab">compare</a>(s1, s2, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>)</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>


into


<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">ret = (int)s1&#91;0&#93; - (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)s2&#91;0&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ret != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">goto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64cc/#abfa1f7dce576430da99eed57807c7f28a191e89dbc4939ebd0b572cae44aac05f">NE</a></span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">...</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">ret = (int)s1&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-2&#93; - (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)s2&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-2&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ret != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">goto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64cc/#abfa1f7dce576430da99eed57807c7f28a191e89dbc4939ebd0b572cae44aac05f">NE</a></span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">ret = (int)s1&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-1&#93; - (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)s2&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-1&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64cc/#abfa1f7dce576430da99eed57807c7f28a191e89dbc4939ebd0b572cae44aac05f">NE</a>:</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>


CFG before and after the transformation:

(before) BBCI

(after) BBCI -&gt; BBSubs&#91;0&#93; (sub,icmp) –NE-&gt; BBNE -&gt; BBTail | ^ E | | | BBSubs&#91;1&#93; (sub,icmp) –NE--—+ ... | BBSubs&#91;N-1&#93; (sub) ------—+

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/aggressiveinstcombine/aggressiveinstcombine-cpp/#l00928">928</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/aggressiveinstcombine/aggressiveinstcombine-cpp">AggressiveInstCombine.cpp</a>.
